The force of the impact almost tipped the couch backwards. “The hell?!” Natsu covered his aching mouth with his hands and glared back at the person who had punched him. The black-haired, muscular form of Gray stepped into Natsu’s house. He stared at Natsu with the most hateful of looks.

“Natsuuuu!” Gray growled, cracking his knuckles and causing the ice that coated one fist to crumble. “Did you think we’re finished? Did you think you could just walk away?!”

“Seriously?” Natsu responded; removing his hands from his mouth. A normal person would of lost most of their teeth after a hit like that; but Natsu was made of sturdier stuff. “I beat you fair and square. Do you want me to kick your ass here in my house too?”

“It was a lucky punch,” replied the shirtless wizard as cold air started to swirl around his fists. “but when I turn you into an ice sculpture and stash you in your own fridge; that WON’T be luck!” Upon giving Natsu his threat the Ice-Make Mage charged toward is fellow Fairy Tail wizard. Natsu, upon instinct, lit his fists aflame and was about to kick his table toward the incoming Gray when a light bulb lit up in his head. The two of them were alone in the privacy of his home; no other guild members to interfere with them. This was the perfect chance for Natsu to try out a new magic he had been practicing all month. A magic the Master would surely punish him for using on a fellow guild mate…if he knew.

“Hehe, too bad for you, Gray.” Natsu spoke as the flames around his fists went out and he stretched out a hand toward Gray. “You just made things a whole lot worse for yourself!” The Dragon Slayer coiled his hand into a fist and a white magic seal formed at the tip of his knuckles. “Reduction Magic!” A moment later the stampeding Gray was consumed in a cloud of white smoke. When the cloud dissipated a second later, Gray was gone. Natsu’s toothily grin returned as he hopped off the couch and stomped over to where Gray had been. As he approached where Gray once was the pink haired male’s grin slowly vanished. “What’s going on here?!” Natsu looked down at the floor, but saw no signs of a shrunken Gray. The spell should of reduced Gray to a miniature size like it did the objects and animals Natsu had practiced on, but instead Gray was simply…gone. He tried to sniff the air to catch a hint of Gray’s scent, but to no avail. “Stupid piece of shit magic! It wasn’t supposed to teleport him somewhere!” Natsu angrily clenched his teeth before sighing with disappointment and turning around. “Oh well…maybe if I’m lucky I sent him halfway across the world. Then he wouldn’t be around here for awhile, hehe!”

~Seconds before~

Gray was rushing toward the seated Natsu when he noticed the scarf-wearing teen make a strange magic seal he had never seen before. He was surprised to see Natsu use another magic besides Fire Magic, but was even more surprised when his vision was overtaken by a screen of smoke.

“Ha, a smokescreen? What an amateur magic!” Gray shouted before he emerged from the smoke cloud. As he did he immediately noticed two things were off. First, his feet were no long touching the floor. In fact he was what seemed to be miles above the ground as if he had just ran off a cliff. Second, the Natsu that sat before him was no longer the Natsu he knew. He was now soaring toward a massive, titanic version of the flame eater! “What the-?!” Before he could end his sentence the tiny Gray smacked right into Natsu’s bare chest. It felt as if he had hit a wall of solid iron, however. “H-How…?” Gray mumbled as his shrunken form slipped off of the giant’s chiseled chest. Before he fell too far Gray reached out and grabbed onto Natsu’s black waistcoat. The tiny wizard was now hanging from Natsu’s clothes as the bigger teen moved. The rosy haired mage had no idea Gray was there; not expecting the Ice-Make Mage to shrink so small. He expected Gray to shrink to around six inches like everything else he used the spell on, but instead Gray shrunk to mere millimeters in height! He was now just a tiny speck barely noticeable on Natsu’s torso. “This…this is not good.”
142.title: Gray's Losing Streak

choices: Natsu thinks it's a bug bite and slaps the "mosquito".
Natsu thinks it's an itch and scratches it.
1421.content:
“I’m kinda hungry.” Natsu mutters as he scratches his growling abdominals. As he recalled, the fight between Gray and him broke out just before he was going to sit down to have some grub. He hadn’t eaten anything since breakfast and he was starving! “Alright, lunchtime!” Natsu marched over to the “kitchen”, a small corner of his house that was decorated with several kitchen supplies. The Fairy Tail mage approached his small refrigerator and took a peek inside. As he was doing this, the tiny shrunken Gray was busy scaling up Natsu’s black waistcoat.

“I can’t believe this happened,” Gray whispered under his breath as he grabbed handful after handful of the thick black material that made up Natsu’s clothing. “What was that fool thinking using such a dangerous magic?!” Gray took a deep breath and tried not to let himself panic. Sure, Natsu had shrunken him to a pathetically small size and humiliated him even more. Sure, Natsu was oblivious to him and could probably crush him without even realizing it. However, Gray was not a quitter! He would not let himself be overcome with fear and hopelessness. His chances may be small, but if Gray could just get the giant hot head’s notice then maybe he could get back to normal. It was far more likely Natsu would take advantage of the situation and do terrible, TERRIBLE things to him, but at least he wouldn’t purposely kill him. Without knowing he was there, however, was a completely different story…

“Let’s see…” Natsu began fishing through the clustered fridge looking for something to eat. “Spoiled milk, rotten vegetables, fish bones, fish bones, fish bones…” Natsu sighed, thinking he wasn’t going to find anything. He would have to head back to town for lunch. Right before he was about to close the fridge, the pink haired teenager noticed a plate wrapped up with plastic. Natsu took out the plate and pulled back the plastic to reveal a mound of spaghetti. Natsu gazed at the pasta hungrily as some drool trickled down his lips. “This is…!” It was some of the spaghetti Lucy had brought over yesterday! She must of put the leftovers in the refrigerator after Happy and him got full. “This is perfect!” Natsu closed the fridge and carried the plate of spaghetti toward the sofas.

Meanwhile, the physically fit Gray was making great progress in his climb up the fire spitting titan. Without being able to put his hands together, Gray was unable to use Ice-Make Magic, but that hadn’t stopped the shrunken teen. He had made it to Natsu’s scarf and was quickly making his way up the white, checkered piece of cloth. Soon he reached the end and threw himself on top of the thick, white scarf. Gray was so tiny that he could rest his entire body on the rim of the scarf as if was a solid floor.

“It’s like…climbing a frickin mountain.” the exhausted Grey groaned. As he rested he watched the world go by as the titan he was riding walked on over to the middle of his home. Soon he came to a stop when he seated himself on one of the couches; the same couch Gray had knocked him into minutes before. The barechested ice wizard glanced over at Natsu’s massive, boyish face next to him as the giant looked down at something in his hands. Gray, however, could not see what it was from here. “Goddammit, Natsu. Look over here!” Gray cursed as he got to his feet and peeked inside the scarf where Natsu’s neck was. Preparing himself, Gray leapt toward Natsu’s normally hidden neck and placed his hands together in midair. “Ice-Make: Battle Axe!” A solid axe of ice appeared in Gray’s hands as he descended toward Natsu’s neck. When he was close enough the ice mage swung the axe down upon the giant’s flesh. The axe, which was smaller than a toothpick, shattered instantly upon connecting with Natsu’s skin. As the thousands of ice particles fell around Gray, the gnat-sized mage touched down on Natsu’s smooth neck and waited to see if their was any reaction.
1421.title: Mt. Dragneel's Lunchtime

choices: Natsu eats all of the pasta.
14212.content:
Gray did the best he could to cling to Natsu’s broad neck while waiting for some kind of reaction from Natsu. Surely the giant must of felt SOMETHING from his attack. He did not have to wait very long. Without the expression on his face changing a bit; Natsu reached a hand behind his scarf. Gray gaped in amazement as Natsu’s huge, god-like hand came into view. Each one of muscular, manly fingers was as thick as a tree trunk. Gray couldn’t help but feel a little intimidated as he imagined what one wrong move from one of those digits could do to him. Thinking Natsu was reaching for him, Gray didn’t move a muscle. By the time he realized Natsu still didn’t have a clue he was there it was too late. Natsu’s fingers touched his neck and he began to scratch. One of those giant fingers caught Gray underneath it; pinning the bug-sized wizard between it and Natsu’s neck. Gray grunted in pain as the digit rubbed him over Natsu’s slightly moist skin; threatening to pop him like a tiny berry. Thankfully Natsu itched for only a second before his hand retreated back to its original spot. Gray, however, remained stuck to the finger pad via the perspiration that coated it.

“F-Fuck!” Gray swore, struggling to free himself from Natsu’s finger.

“This is gonna hit the spot!” Natsu announced to the empty house before placing the plate of pasta on the wooden table in front of him. The fire mage then hovered a hand over the spaghetti; fingers spread wide. At this precise moment Gray peeled off of Natsu’s fingertip and fell into the plate of pasta. The half-naked teen coughed as he picked himself up after the soft landing; his face and torso covered in red sauce.

“What is this?” Gray pondered as he stood up at the peak of the pasta mound. He ran his tongue over his lips to taste the red stuff he was covered in. “…marinara sauce? But that must mean…” Gray’s blue eyes widened in horror and he looked back down at what he was standing on. Noodles…he was standing on a mountain of noodles! Now Gray started to get scared, but things were only beginning to go downhill. The shrunken Fairy Tail wizard noticed the air around him start to twist and the heat level slowly rise. The frozen, hardened sauce covering the spaghetti began to soften and bubble a bit. The thick noodles themselves softened under Gray’s feet as they grew warmer and warmer. Gray, puzzled, craned his neck and looked up. The titan that was Natsu was holding his palm out over the pasta; his hand lit by a raging flame. Natsu was directing heat down onto the pasta; heating it up! “N-No! Natsu, stop!” Gray called, but there was no way Natsu was going to hear his voice. The heat rose and rose as Gray started sweating profoundly. He tried to move through the pasta mound; but his feet sank deeper into the spaghetti and there was just too much of it. Gray couldn’t even see the end of the pasta; it was like a valley of red sauce and spaghetti to him. The extreme heat started taking its toll on Gray as he collapsed to his knees and his mouth went dry. All around him the pasta was popping and sizzling under the heat the fire giant was giving it. The mini-mage weakly put his fist into his palm and attempted to use Ice-Make Magic. “I-Ice-Make…” It was hopeless; the ice particles around his hands quickly melted and evaporated into steam. His magic was useless in this heat.

“N-Natsu…y-you, idiot…” Gray fell onto his stomach; wincing as the bubbling hot marinara sauce singed his skin. It was so hot that his sweat started to evaporate off his reddening skin. Gray could just lay there and whimper under the fearsome heat while waiting for his blood to boil. Before that could happen, Natsu retracted his hand and the heat stopped increasing. Still, Gray was too weak to move a muscle and simply rested there in the warm noodles; thick steam all around him.

“Oooh, looks delicious!” Natsu licked his lips hungrily as he took out a fork he had also brought along. Using the fork the giant rose head began stirring the spaghetti and sauce around. He did not notice the little Gray in his food as his body was swept underneath the pasta and buried under several tons of spaghetti and several gallons of red tomato sauce. “Time to eat!” exclaimed Natsu as he twirled the fork and spun himself a large ball of red smeared spaghetti. He then brought the ball of pasta to his mouth, opened wide, and slurped all of it right off the fork. The Dragon Slayer made content sounds as he chewed loudly a few times (much less than normally needed) and swallowed his first bite down. It formed a thick lump in his throat that traveled down the inside before disappearing into his toned chest. “Ahhhh, it tastes great!” Natsu grinned happily and went for another bite; unaware of the little extra addition to his meal.
14212.title: Turn Up the Heat

142121.content:
The hungry Dragon Slayer consumed forkful after forkful of the delicious pasta; each one masticated only barely before being sent down the teen’s gullet. Not once did Natsu come close to choking; his powerful inner muscles did their job well and made sure each mouthful was carried down to where it belonged. As he ate, Natsu didn’t know that a certain rival of his was fighting for his life within the mound of pasta in front of him. Gray, able to hear what Natsu was doing far above him, crawled for his life to escape the mess he had gotten into. In his disoriented and weakened state, however, Gray was not doing a very good job at escaping his fate. Within the maze of marinara sauce and thick strings of spaghetti Gray could not tell that he was merely crawling around in circles. Nor did he know that his erratic movements were saving him from certain doom. Several times Natsu had rolled up a ball of pasta made from an area Gray had just been in. Luck seemed to be on Gray’s side, but that luck was about to run out.

“Ahhh, so full.” moaned the teenage mage as he laid back on his sofa and gave his firm abs a few pats. His black eyes glanced down at the plate on the table and he saw one small heap of pasta left. Natsu stared at the remaining food for a moment before smirking. “I guess one more bite won’t hurt.” The wizard sat back up, aimed his fork at the last of his lunch, and brought it down.

Inside that heap of pasta was Gray; still digging through noodles and sauce for a glimpse at freedom. No matter how many strings of spaghetti he seemed to push aside there would always be more behind them. Gray started to think he’d never get out; he didn’t hear Natsu’s loud chewing and swallowing outside either. Would he be lost in this maze of pasta for as long as it took Natsu to throw it into the trash? Was that his ultimate fate? Soon after thinking this, Gray pushed himself past some more noodles and saw a glimpse of the outside world. Desperately he clawed his way toward it and pulled half his body out into the open. Despite his body screaming at him for a rest, a smile formed on Gray’s face. He had made it out; he wasn’t going to end up a meal for that fire breathing iguana! All he had to do was pull the rest of himself out and then…

Before he could advance any further, Gray’s luck went dry. Natsu plunged the fork into the last heap of pasta on his plate and spun it around. The noodles tangled around Gray’s lower half started to move and he was pulled with them. He gave a panicked scream as his speck-sized body was yanked away from freedom and firmly held between the noodles that closed in around him. Once Natsu had spun up his last ball of spaghetti he raised it up from the plate and held it in front of his huge face. He eyed the last of the pasta and ran his tongue over his lips once more. He didn’t see Gray on the outside of the ball; held in place by several noodles not much smaller than himself. Gray, however, saw him. He saw Natsu’s youthful face as it looked at him hungrily and he saw as his huge lips parted to reveal his saliva drenched maw. Gray stared into the dark cavern of Natsu’s mouth and fruitlessly pulled at the spaghetti that bound him to the fork. A look of unspeakable horror was glued to his face as the fork sped toward Natsu’s open mouth.

“NO! NATSU! YOU’RE GONNA EAT ME!” Gray cried out with anguish, but it went unheard as the fork disappeared between Natsu’s lips. Natsu closed his eyes and savored the last bite as he slipped the clean fork out of his mouth. Inside the hot cavern Gray was tossed around the mouth and lost all sense of direction. He screamed, but couldn’t even hear his own voice over the sound of the titan chewing and reducing the pasta around him to mush with his pearly whites. With most of the noodles still whole Natsu tilted his head back and gulped powerfully. He was none the wiser to the little ice mage that was swept into his esophagus as well and pulled down to his awaiting belly. Natsu dropped the fork onto the empty plate and leaned back on his sofa; both hands patting his gurgling stomach. Behind those hard abs, Gray fell into the hot chamber that was the Dragon Slayer’s stomach. He landed with a plop into a mound of chewed up and whole noodles; remarkably less than there should have been. For Natsu’s digestive acids were like lava; quickly breaking down anything and everything the fire mage ate. Gray resumed his struggles within his new confinement; but it was short-lived. The mound of pasta slowly sank into the gastric lake at the bottom of Natsu’s stomach and Gray along with it. The frantic Ice-Make Mage’s muffled screams were completely drowned out by the churning and squelching of Natsu’s belly, and eventually they just…stopped. The mighty Fire Dragon Slayer gave his abs one last slap before opening his mouth and belching loudly. He then smacked his lips and laced his arms behind his head; eyes fixated on his gurgling belly.

“Mmmm, not bad! Now if only I had the chance to do to Gray what my stomach’s doing to that pasta!”
142121.title: Fire Dragon's Consuming Maw

143.content:
"Urrgh... my head!" Gajeel said, his hand on his forehead. He winced in pain, feeling like his brain was being hammered constantly. Fortunately for him, the sharp pain faded after a few seconds. The iron dragon slayer got to his feet and shook his head, trying to remember why his head ached so bad. All he remembered was sitting at a table in the guild's hall and suddenly, he blacked out.

"Something must have hit me behind the head... urgh!" He muttered, looking around to see if anybody decided to go all smart-ass on him. "What the...?" He then realized; something was off... way off. The tables and chairs around him were huge! Or rather, he was minuscule! Even a mere chair leg was around ten times wider than him. The whole thing being so surreal and so sudden, Gajeel felt a little light-headed, tumbling around as his brain tried to assimilate the learned information.

"Heh... no use standing here. Gotta find a way to get back to normal. I won't accept being that puny for much longer." He was about to move in any direction when the ground started trembling. At first it was quite faint, but it quickly gained in intensity. So much that Gajeel ended up falling on his butt, then bounced up and down on the hard wooden floor of the hall. "Damnit! What's all this ruckus?!"

Then as suddenly as they started, the quakes came to an end. The iron dragon slayer got back to his feet once again to look around, and he spots something. For the first time since he woke up, he sees another living person. Sure, they were huge, but it was better than nobody at all. "Hmm, now to get his attention."

Gajeel thought that he should see who it is first, as looking at their feet won't tell everything. He looks up and sees none other than...
143.title: The Iron Dragon Slayer's Misfortune

choices: Pantherlily sat on a bench at the bar.
Pantherlily lifted his foot to scritch it.
1432.content:
"Lily!" Gajeel yelled as he noticed his partner right in front of him. He could see the black furred Exceed, his maroon eyes looking forward. The iron dragon slayer waved, but Pantherlily wasn't noticing him. Even in his chibi form, the panther was still humongous compared to the puny half-inch tall Gajeel. He ran towards him, hoping to get his attention once he got closer, but his partner advanced towards him right as he was only a few feet away. His eyes opened wide once he realized that his friend might just crush him where he stood if his steps had a right timing.

The iron muncher turned in a ninety degrees angle and dashed to the side, but Lily's tiny squeaky steps got dangerously closer to him. A shadow covered the iron dragon slayer, he looked up to see that white furred sole come down on him at an alarming speed. He tried to dodge it, but Pantherlily's size was way too important for him to avoid the paw entirely. Even though it was heavy, the foot was quite soft when it slammed on Gajeel.

When the foot lifted up, the young man found himself stuck to the sole quite tightly, tucked in white fuzz. "Urrgh!" Gajeel whined as the foot repeatedly got up and down on him as Pantherlily walked. He thanked his iron scales for protecting him from a crushing fate, but he was still quite uncomfortable each time the hard wooden floor came up on his front. "LILY!!!" He screamed out of his lungs, but to no avail. Even his cat wouldn't hear him at this size.

After interminable seconds, the footsteps stopped, and Gajeel found himself muffled by the ground. After a few seconds of breath-taking torture, the foot goes up and doesn't come down.
1432.title: Not such a small black cat anymore...

choices: Pantherlily devours the nachos very quickly.
Pantherlily takes his time to savour the delicious nachos.
14321.content:
Gajeel didn't know why his partner stopped walking, but he didn't mind. He sighed in relief, unable to take any more crushing against the hard floor. He immediately tried to pray himself off the furry white sole, but he was sank in Pantherlily's flesh pretty hard. As he pushes against the soft and musky surface, he can hear some talking from above. He stops an instant to listen, he can hear Lily and Mirajane's voice. "Oh, hello, Lily! Would you like something to eat?" Mirajane asked with her soft voice.

"Yes please. I would like to try nachos, I've never eaten any." The black Exceed replied.

"Right away. I'm sure you'll enjoy them."

"Thank you."

The iron dragon slayer felt relieved, this meant that Pantherlily would stay at the bar for a while, which would give him plenty of time to get off from under his foot and try to get his attention. With a sudden spurt of will and strength, the iron muncher finally teared himself from the fuzzy paw. He hanged unto the fur and swung to the tip of his toes. He panted a little, pulling himself on top of the now black foot, reaching the ankle and catching his breath. He hoped his cat wouldn't move his legs too much as he grabbed the fur of the shin and started climbing, helping himself with the slightly sinking flesh to keep his grip.

Thankfully, Lily was in his small form; he was MUCH shorter like this, and Gajeel reached his waist rather quickly. He was getting quite tired though, it still required a lot of effort even if he had all that fur to get a good grip on. But he kept on, the top of the table was near.

Mirajane came back with a plate filled with nachos, a delicious, thick cheese sauce copiously covering the chips. "There you go. Bon appétit."

"It really does look good, thank you, Mirajane."

As the waitress got back to serve someone on the other side of the bar, Lily got up to have a better look at the plate. He was quite tiny, and he got frustrated when he noticed he could barely touch the plate. He picked the closest nacho and pulled it closer to him, sniffing it. His mouth spread into a smile; the panther found the nacho's smell quite enticing. He opened wide a took a bite of it. He instantly fell in love with the cheesy goodness, devouring the rest of the nacho quite quickly. But then, he realized that it would take him ages to eat that generous serving at his size. He looked around, and then decided to change into his battle form. He expanded rather fast, his bulk greatly increasing, his palms and soles turning black just like the rest of his body and his face morphing into a more mature figure. He grinned, this time he would be able to eat much easier.

Gajeel was up to Pantherlily's chest, able to perceive the huge plate of food, when the black Exceed started growing. The huge burst of magic took him by surprise, expelling him from the huge body. He was thrown quite high in the air, falling down right in the nachos. Covered in hot cheese, he squirmed madly, getting back to the surface before drowning in it. He gasped and looked around, realizing he had fallen in quite a bad place. A shadow covered his sight, and he looked up to see Lily's huge, now human-like, hand come down towards him. He gasped and quickly moved away as the panther's thumb and index pinched the tip of a nacho, pulling it off with a sticky bit of cheese. He hoped he had the time to get away more, because the sickening crunching noises he heard behind him weren't reassuring at all. He did not want to hear them from any closer.
14321.title: Ordering some food.

choices: Gajeel is licked into Pantherlily's maw
Gajeel drops back down onto the plate
143212.content:
When Gajeel landed in the mass of nachos he had no idea which way was quickest off the plate of delicious food but he did know he wanted to be as far away from Lily as possible. So he turned and began to make his way away form Lily as the crunching sound turned to chewing then finally an audible gulp, sending shivers down his spine. As Gajeel attempted to wade his way through the thick cheese and around the large nachos he could see the shadow of Lily's hand come close and grab the next chip right beside him. The nacho was slowly pulled from the pile, a long sting of cheese still connected to the plate, as a pleasurable purr could be heard from Lily who was greatly enjoying his savoury treat.

Gajeel turned just in time to see his partners maw open revealing the slimy pink insides as the whole chip was placed inside then disappear, closed eyes as another loud crunch was heard. He was in awe as he watched the jaw worked to turn the once crunchy nacho into mush for easy swallowing then a large bump go down Lily's neck with a loud gulp. If he didn't get off this plate soon that might be him going down to meet the same fate as the rest of the plate. Lily looked back down at the plate before him and licked his lips, nearly half the plate already devoured.

Gajeel thought this might be his chance to be seen and rescued from this minuscule size so he began to wave his arms and shout for Lily's attention. His idea seemed to be working as Lily looked closely at the plate and leaned in a bit closer, a paw moving right over to where Gajeel stood. Little did he know that being covered in cheese did him no favours in revealing his true self and Lily's paw went right over him to grab the nacho right behind him.

The tipping of the chip caused a wave of melted cheese to take Gajeel for a ride as the nacho was pulled away from the plate and towards the hungry maw of his partner. Still half buried in the cheese Gajeel was pulled along by the stretchy sticky string of cheese attached to the chip as it was placed in his partners waiting mouth. He heard the first crunch as he dangled from the strand of cheese dangerously close to the humid muzzle. A quick lick brought half the sting of cheese in to join the rest of the nacho as Gajeel began to yell for his friends attention and struggle to get out the sticky and deadly cheese.
143212.title: Pantherlily takes his time to savour the delici...

choices: Woke up on the train (on a mission)
Woke up in a house (Pantherlily went home)
14322.content:
Pantherlily had stopped walking after feeling a itch on the bottom of his foot he then lifted it up to scratch it. Gajeel thought that his exceed companion had finally noticed him and started to yell “Lily! Im-" Gajeel was cut off as Pantherlily's huge fingers (To Gajeel) scratched over him.

The scratch wasn't enough to hurt Gajeel but it was strong enough to make him change positions so that he was facing Pantherlily's foot rather than the floor. It also pushed Gajeel even deeper into the exceeds foot “Urrgh, I cant move.." Gajeel said struggling to move he then felt something wet come down on his face “gross!" Gajeel yelled realizing it was a drop off sweat!. Gajeel got the wind knocked out of him every time Pantherlily took a step and was forced to breath in Pantherlily's musk every time it went up. Gajeel then passed out due to the strain on his body and then woke up in..
14322.title: Pantherlily lifted his foot to scritch it.

1541.content:
It had been over a year since peace had returned to Amestris after the Promised Day. This peace was accomplished largely by the Elric brothers and their heroic efforts. Things had returned mostly to normal for Edward and Alphonse, but life in Amestris was still very interesting...

Edward Elric was in a very bad mood. Just over a year ago, he was excited about finally growing taller, but now he realized that he was somehow getting shorter in height.

“How is this even possible!” Edward yelled furiously, holding a measuring stick in his hand.

“What’s wrong, Ed?” Winry called from a nearby room. She and Ed had finally moved in together after several months of awkward interactions. While they were not officially married, they had plans for a wedding in the future.

“I know I was 5 foot 8 last year, and now I’m 5 foot 5!” Ed exclaimed. “Somehow I shrunk, and I blame it on that asshole Truth.”

“You’re probably just imagining that because you can’t accept being shorter than me,” Winry responded, unaware of her mistake.

“I am NOT short!” Edward screamed in reply.

“What’s the matter, Ed?” Alphonse asked as he entered the house.

“Height problems,” Winry told him. “Not that you’d understand.”

Al, like Winry, was taller than Ed, but he towered over his brother by nearly a foot. After the Promised Day, Al, to Ed’s irritation, had a major growth spurt and quickly grew much larger than Ed.

“If you only drank your milk, this would never have happened,” the 6 foot 4 Al told Ed.

“This has nothing to do with milk!” Ed yelled. “I’m shrinking! I’m 3 inches shorter than I was last year!”

“Are you sure you haven’t always been this height?” Al asked, cockily placing his large hand on Edward’s
head.

Ed pushed Al’s hand away and sprinted out of the room angrily. Why don’t they believe me? He wondered to himself. Suddenly, Edward felt a strange sensation, almost as if his body was being compressed. He immediately fell unconscious for several seconds.

When Ed opened his eyes, he was surrounded by an enormous room. He quickly recognized his house, but he realized that it was a giant version of it. Is this a dream? He thought. At that moment, Ed felt a rumble and noticed an unbelievably massive figure approaching him. This giant was ...
1541.title: Edward

Hughes Tries to Get Al's Attention
154331.content:
The Elric brothers were staying at the Hughes home, after practically being dragged there by Maes, who was currently sitting up early that morning having a cup of coffee before anyone else had awoke.

Maes had of course heard of them, and of the taboo they committed in trying to bring their mother back to life. But he didn't pry, figuring the boys would have a hard enough time ahead of them already. Something had been growing on his mind lately, he needed to visit the archive room at HQ. Leaving a note on the table, he put on his work uniform and left.

***Central HQ Archive Room***

"Liore, these endless uprisings, Philosophers Stone, human sacrifices, and the outright genocide of the Ishvalan people..." Lieutenant Colonel Hughes muttered to himself as he circled each point on the map. When each point was connected, it became something so horrifying that Hughes couldn't have begun to imagine it in his wildest nightmares.

"This means.....how could this even happen!? Who could've orchestrated something as terrible as this? I've gotta tell the Fuhrer right away!"

The open door to the archive room closed, and the figure of a woman stood between him and the only exit.

"Hello Lieutenant Colonel, its nice to meet you. Well...hello really isn't the word I'm looking for." The woman said in her seductive voice.

Maes saw the Ouroboros tattoo centered above her breasts.

"Cool tattoo." Maes pulled one of his push knives from his sleeve and threw it just as the woman's elongated claws pierced through his shoulder, throwing him against the wall
Lust jerked her claws out from Hughes' shoulder, and aimed for his head, "Enough!" a tall man from the shadows held up his hand and Lust's deadly blades stopped inches from Maes' neck.

A tall black man emerged from the shadows and Lust backed away, retracting her claws. "Captain Fokker? Don't tell me you're involved with this!?"

"Hm? Oh I'm sorry, I'm still incognito aren't I? Hehe, just a sec."

Red light shone everywhere about the room and soon Fokker was gone and before Maes stood a skinny boy with long black hair with a greenish tint to it.

"Father wants us to do things a little differently this time, he's found a new use for the Philosopher's Stone!" Envy held up a vial full of red liquid, he uncorked it and held the struggling and wide eyed Maes down. "This'll only hurt a lot. Hehehehe!" Envy laughed as he poured the solidifying stone into Maes' wound.

Maes Hughes felt an excruciating pain for a little over a minute, and then blacked out.

*****

Hughes rubbed his eyes and yawned, thinking the entire previous occurrence was nothing but a bizarre dream. That was when his vision began to clear and he saw where he was. He was in fact, on the floor of the train at the feet of Alphonse and Edward Elric as they rode through the night toward Winry's house. He began to overhear bits of their conversation, "Its really sad about Lieutenant Colonel Hughes disappearance isn't it Ed?"

"Yeah, I hope they find him safe soon."

Hughes couldn't believe it, how long had he been out?! His family must be worried sick! "First things first," Hughes told himself, "I have to get these two's attention."
154331.title: Maes Hughes' Disappearance

155111.content:
"I can't believe I lost..." Joey spoke as he fell to his knees in front of a hooded figure. The figure grinned mischievously underneath his hood, "You lost a shadow game, so your soul is forfeit to me. But wait... how interesting you are. I might let you keep your soul and do something else with you." The hooded figure walks closer to Joey as he starts to get sleepy and eventually loses consciousness. Joey dreams about his loss and about that mysterious hooded figure who, in the dream, looked absolutely gigantic in size! The hooded duelist raises a foot over Joey before...

"AHHHH!!" Joey screams as he wakes up with a start. He gets a pain in his head, "Ow... that hurt..." It is only then that he looks at his surroundings, "Where... am I?"

His surroundings looked like...
155111.title: The "Shrink" Card

1551111.content:
Joey found himself standing on a plank of a hardwood floor, staring up at his surroundings. On the far side of the room was a bed with dinosaur print on it. There were models of Pterodactyls hanging from the ceiling and T-Rex toys on the shelves, acting as bookends for magazines and books on the subject. It even had a trophy on it that read "Dueling Championship Runner-Up". To a perceptive person, it would be obvious that Joey was standing in Rex Raptor's room. But to Joey, it was some random kid's room. Suddenly, there was what felt like an earthquake. A small glass of water on top of a desk nearby started rippling with each tremor. Joey needed to hide somewhere, but there was a very limited number of places for him to hide. Near the door was a sock that was obviously worn before. Closer to where he was laid a pair of obviously used underwear.

Where would Joey run to?
1551111.title: Rex Raptor's Room!

15511112.content:
Joey had only seconds to act. He didn’t have time to understand what happened to him; only that he had somehow ended up in the room of a giant! He had seen giant monster films before; this earthquake he felt wasn’t being caused by seismic waves, it was being caused by giant footsteps! Most likely they belonged to whoever’s room this was and Joey didn’t want to be out in the open when that door opened. Joey wasn’t taking into account his pathetically small size, however. Even if he stayed where he was he probably wouldn’t be noticed right away. Then again, Joey wasn’t thinking very calmly right now, shown more apparent when he hops into the nearby pair of used underwear! Sure, it was closer than the sock, but still…it was a pair of used underwear!

“Ugh, already regretting this decision.” Joey mumbled to himself as he plugged his nose to keep out the rank smell of the used undergarment. The ant sized teen was hidden among the folds of the white fabric, but it smelled so bad that Joey wondered if he had the time to give the sock a try instead. That plan was quickly shot down when the door to the bedroom swung open; triggering Joey to quickly lay down on his stomach and keep perfectly still.

Enter Rex Raptor; the Dinosaur duelist. Rex had just come from the shower; his brown and purple hair still a little damp. His torso, which was not as muscular as the taller Joey’s but still toned, also glistened with wetness. The teenage duelist was wearing nothing but a towel around his waste, and upon entering the privacy of his room and closing the door he let the towel fall to the floor. The now nude giant proceeded to his dresser; stepping right over Joey and his hiding place. The frightened little man glanced up and saw the huge shadow of the giant pass over him. It was just his silhouette, but Joey could already tell how massive he was compared to himself. Once at the dresser Rex started fishing out some clean clothes to wear and tossed them onto his bed. When he reached his underwear draw, however…

“Shit, out of underwear.” Rex cursed under his breath; his voice too low for Joey to hear and identify him. The long haired duelist spun around and gave his room a quick glance-around. His purple-blue eyes locked onto Joey’s hiding spot. It was the same underwear he was wearing before hopping into the shower. “It’ll have to do.” The naked teen stomped over to the underwear and, without knowing of its little passenger, slipped his bare and moist feet into them. This startled Joey, who only saw two walls of flesh appear within his dingy and stained hiding place.

“Did he already find me?!” Joey wondered out loud as he tried to scramble out of the underwear. It was no use, however, as Rex had already reached down and gripped the rim of the undergarment. He swiftly pulled up; the underwear riding up his legs and speeding toward his groin. Joey’s hysterical screams went unheard as he looked up and saw…
15511112.title: Bad Hiding Spot #104

155112.title: No Way!

1552.title: Eyeshield 21

15521.content:
The sun was setting. Practice was just getting over when a familiar voice shouted, "Hey, Eyeshield! Get over here for a minute, will ya?" It was the sound of the demonic quarterback himself, Hiruma Yoichi. Sena, known by his fans as Eyeshield, ran towards Hiruma and followed him into the quarterback's personal office. As soon as Sena walked in the doors, Hiruma slammed the door shut and locked it, "Now that the football season is over until next fall, I've got some special endurance training just for you!"

Sena blinked. He was incredibly afraid of what Hiruma would propose as a part of his training, but Hiruma was never wrong. It was then that the demonic quarterback pulled out a vial of strange, glowing liquid, "Drink this." Sena looked at it, "Uhh... what is it?" Hiruma grinned widely, "That's a secret. Just drink it."

Fearing the quarterback, he nodded and drank the contents of the vial. Hiruma could only laugh as he watched Sena shrink down until he was only an inch tall, "Now then, my little buggy Eyeshield, you're gonna be getting close to one of your fellow teammates. VERY close. Your training is to live out your entire summer inside of the clothing of this particular teammate. Food and drink shouldn't be a problem, but you will constantly have to keep on the move in order to survive the perils of being an insect. And because I'm so generous, I'll let you choose which teammate you get to stay with." All of a sudden, Hiruma pops off one of his football cleats and, placing Sena on the ground, places his foot on top of the little running back, "HOWEVER! If you should leave your assigned teammate OR your assigned teammate finds out that you've been shrunken down, I'll take you for myself." Hiruma applies pressure to Sena's body under his smelly foot, "And trust me, my feet are the absolute least of your worries, GOT IT?"

Sena screams out "I GOT IT, I GOT IT! PLEASE LET ME GO!"

Hiruma removes his foot from Sena and slams it next to him, "Good, now I made sure everyone else would be gone for a few minutes longer, so you'll have some time to choose whose clothes you'll be inhabiting for your entire summer." Sena gulped and then made his decision. "I want to stay with..."
15521.title: Hiruma Strikes Again!

155211.content:
"YA-HA! If you really want to be in that monkey's clothing the entire summer, that's your prerogative. Though considering the amount of trees he must climb, I'd make sure to have a good handhold, if I were you." Hiruma taunted the tiny Sena as he picked him up and carried him to Monta's locker, "Now remember. Either you stay inside monkey-boy's clothes with him completely unaware, or you're my little toy for the entire summer, and I WILL know if you escape. Got it?"

"...I understand..." Sena sighed, defeated.

Hiruma grinned and rummaged through Monta's clothes, pulling out a sock and a pair of underwear, "Now then, do you want to go in the monkey's sock, with his horrible foot odor, creepy dexterity, and possible chance of being a smear on his sole? Or do you want to go into his underwear, his most private of places? I wonder if you'd want to get to know your best friend THAT well. Oh, and as long as you stay in his clothes, I don't care if you want to change back and forth. Feel free to explore all aspects of that monkeyboy that you want."

What article of Monta's clothing will Sena start with?
155211.title: Monta

1552111.content:
“His sock, eh?” Hiruma replied in an almost disappointed tone. “What’s the matter? Too afraid to get that close to your buddy?” Hiruma chuckled mockingly at Sena. “Oh well, not my problem. You have all summer to find yourself in there anyway! That is, assuming you don’t get crushed on the way home!” The demonic teen cackled evilly before tossing the underwear back into the locker. Before the tiny running back could even think about changing his answer, Hiruma held him above the sock’s opening with his slender fingers and dropped him inside. Sena itty-bitty Sena screamed as he fell into the white sock; barely hitting the bottom before he was also tossed into the pile of clothes within Monta’s locker. The spiky haired blond was about to shut the locker door when Sena shouted at him from within the sock. His voice was so soft and muffled at that size that no one would of usually heard him; but Hiruma had the advantage of knowing the tiny high schooler’s predicament.

“Wait, Hiruma! Isn’t this…isn’t this really dangerous?!” Sena shouted as he pressed himself against the cotton wall that separated him and the one who had put him in this situation. “What if Monta really does crush me?!”

“Huh? That’s a fucking stupid question.” Hiruma answered with a look as if Sena had just asked him what color the sky was. “If you get crushed then you get crushed; simple as that! No one will ever know a thing and I’ll just tell them you quit and moved to another country or something. Anyway, good luck Eyeshield, you’ll need it.” Hiruma chuckled one last time before slamming the locker shut; consuming Sena in darkness. The shrunken male sat there in the slightly musky sock and shook nervously. He wanted to believe the quarterback wouldn’t really put him in such a dangerous position, but he knew the opposite was totally fitting for his personality. Sena had no choice but to tackle this challenge head on and come out of it stronger than ever! The petit athlete nodded to himself and clenched his fists; preparing himself for what was about to happen.

He didn’t have to wait long at all. Mere minutes after Hiruma had left him the sound of a stampede started outside. From experience Sena knew it was the sound of his teammates stomping into the locker room. Sena could make out booming chatter far away, but was unable to tell which voices belonged to who. Soon the chatter was accompanied by the rummaging of clothes as the Deimon Devil Bats changed out of their sweaty, dirty uniforms. This reminded Sena that he was still in his football gear, minus the helmet.

“Maybe it’ll give me a little more protection.” Sena said to himself as he tapped his hard shoulder pads. Still, he wasn’t very enthusiastic about spending the entire summer in them.

“Hey, Hiruma, where’s Sena?” came a loud, clear voice that Sena quickly recognized as Monta’s. His theory was quickly confirmed as the locker opened and the inside was flooded with light. Sena couldn’t see his friend through the thick material of the sock, but he could make out a very monkey-like shadow. Monta’s gargantuan hands snatched up articles of clothing one by one as he put them on; seemingly saving his socks for last.

“He’s probably on a jet to Italy by now! I set him up with a very special training program; don’t expect to see him at all this summer.” came Hiruma’s response, followed by a snicker.

“What?! No way!” replied the skilled receiver as he grabbed his socks out of the locker. Sena yelped and grabbed handfuls of his white, dingy prison to keep him from fumbling around inside. Raimon sat down on a bench and tugged his left sock on; followed by his right. The shrunken, spiky haired boy watched as Monta’s big, plump toes appeared at the top of the sock. They were quickly joined by the rest of his huge foot and Sena’s eyes widened at the sheer size of what was coming down toward him. He had time to wonder if perhaps he was biting off more than he could chew before the sweaty, tanned sole of his best friend slammed into him. The wind was knocked out of tiny Sena’s lungs as he was securely pinned between the sock and Monta’s steamy hot foot. In seconds the monkey boy slipped on his sneakers as well and stood up; turning Sena’s groans of discomfort into groans of agony as unbelievable weight was put on his miniature form. “I was really looking forward to hanging out with him! This sucks MAX!” Monta pouted before saying goodbye to Kurita and the others and heading out the door. Once Raimon was gone Hiruma couldn’t help but grin devilishly. Little did the energetic monkey know Sena would be hanging out with him all summer long.
1552111.title: The Beginning of a Long (or very Short) Summer

choices: Kengo Mizumachi, Lineman of the Kyoshin Poseidons!
15521112.content:
Monta was on the road home, practically stomping his feet in disappointment, "This really sucks! I wanted to hang out with Sena this summer! We we're gonna finally hit the beach!" With each step, Monta's feet started to build up more and more oily, musky sweat only to be absorbed by his best friend and unaware insole, Sena. Sena was having a very hard time breathing. Even though Monta's sneaker was breathable, the foot odor blocked any chance of Sena getting any fresh air. Not to mention that his prison was moving up and down in a somewhat rapid motion, making him feel slightly ill. Sena wished he wasn't tricked by Hiruma into this situation, I'm not sure I'm going to last the entire summer like this. But if I let Monta know I'm in here, Hiruma will keep me like this forever!

Suddenly, a loud blaring noise comes from Monta's pocket, *Kanjita you ni yattetai na, taishitamon ja nai ze right now! Kankiwamatte kazashita my hands, kanshou babe be survivor!* Monta pulled out his cell phone and answered it glumly, "Hello?" The voice on the other line spoke, but it was hard to hear to everyone except Monta, "Oh hey! I just found out Sena was going to be training overseas, so I won't be able to hang out with him. Really sucks!" Then the voice spoke again and Monta's eyes lit up and he started to blush a little, "H-hehehe, I guess we could do that instead, I didn't think about that! J-just remember. It's a secret! If anyone on the team found out, especially Hiruma, both of our lives would be over!" The voice spoke once more, with Monta's grin widening and his face turning even redder, "Then I'll see you then, babe!"

As Monta hung up the phone, he squatted down and did a backflip in pure happiness, "Turnabout MAX! This is gonna be so awesome! While Sena's off training, I get to go hang out with the person of my dreams!" As Monta does this backflip, Sena slides across Monta's slippery sole and ends up between his best friend's toes upside-down, his face buried in the underside of Monta's toes. Monta then starts sprinting towards his destination, a nice, secluded spot that even Hiruma might not know about. After waiting for ten minutes, Monta hears footsteps from behind him and he turns around. Seeing the person coming towards him, he starts grinning widely, "It's so awesome to see you again, babe! We hardly never get to see eachother anymore!"

Who is this person that has stolen the heart of Sena's best (and biggest) friend?

155321.content:
"Hey, quick, pass the ball over here!" shouted Davis to his teammate as the opposition closed in on him. The guys were having another game that day, their team vs. TK's again, to whom Davis was ready to prove himself to the blonde (after having been defeated countless times by him before) once and for all. He wanted more than anything to win now. The boy quickly threw Davis the ball before the other team could steal it, and Davis caught it, dribbling it up toward the net, heart pounding. He was closing in on making the winning score, no one up front to stop him for once. He could imagine himself leaping into the air and straight down slam dunking the ball ever so gracefully into the net, impressing everyone in the stadium. At least, that's how he would've liked for it to have happened... had he not tripped on his suddenly undone shoelaces and fell face forward into the pole of the basketball net, knocking him clear unconscious, ball bouncing off in the opposite direction somewhere as everyone just stood there and stared in a confused daze. The last thing he remembered were people calling out his name, "Davis!" then everything going fuzzy and blank.

Now he awoke groggily, a slight headache on him, sweat clinging in beads to his forehead. "Wha...what happened?" he asked to no one in particular, looking around to what appeared to be the familiar sight of the boy's locker room... only now 20 times bigger? "Huh?" he suddenly gawked aloud, looking around the now massive room and seemingly skyscraper tall lockers. "Wha?? How-how did this happen?!" he cried out, getting up from the floor and looking around frantically. He suddenly heard massive steps far off that were getting closer, nearing the corner where he was at. He eeped and quickly scurried beneath a bench like a little mouse, as he then watched two massive basketball shoe'd feet stomp past him, shaking the floor a bit beneath him like a mini earthquake. He couldn't believe this was happening. Everything was so large now... Could he be dreaming all of this? Anyway, his curiosity getting the better of him, he poked his little head out past the bench's leg and looked up to see that the giant shoes belonged to none other than TK himself. And it looked like the blonde-haired boy was talking on his cell phone. He listened... "Yeah, I'm sure he'll be all right... It was just a minor concussion, they said... Yeah, I was shocked, honestly, though. It just happened all so quick..." As he continued listening, he could obviously tell that the conversation was about him. He felt so embarrassed... tripping on his own shoelaces and knocking himself unconscious on the basketball net's pole. No one would ever let that down for him. And now to make matters even worse, he was only about 1 inch tall somehow. He cursed out loud to himself, as he continued to listen. TK was wrapping up the conversation with whoever he was talking to (probably Kari) and hung up. He then started to change back into his normal clothes that were in his locker there.

Davis wanted to get his attention, but was slightly nervous at the same time... What would TK do when he found him? Possibly think he was a bug and squish him? He contemplated this as TK was taking off his shoes, then started reaching for his gym socks, just as Davis decided to move forward. As Davis crept up, an odd smell suddenly stung his nose like a wasp... He smelled the horrible stench of TK's sweaty barefeet slapping the ground, as the blonde-haired boy from above placed his shoes and socks into his gym bag. His feet on the ground, sweat visibly rolling down in streams off the pink, ripened skin from the hectic game. The Takaishi boy sighed, wiggling his lint-caked toes as he enjoyed the coolness of the floor on his hot soles. "Aw man, TK, that's nasty!" Davis shouted up to him. TK suddenly looked up, "Huh?" hearing the tiny voice as a little peep. "I'm down here!" Davis shouted again. TK just looked around cluelessly. Davis growled underneath his breath as he then began to approach the blonde's feet closer, much to his disgust, and got near enough to where he could actually touch the side of TK's foot. Reaching out, he did, as he began petting the steamy, sweaty flesh, which made him want to puke. Still, he hoped TK would feel it and notice him. TK, who had shrugged off the noises and was putting on his signature white "Gilligan's" hat, felt a tickling by his foot. He looked down and blinked, noticing that by his foot what looked like to be...

1553211.title: Seeing Things?

15532111.content:
...put on the pair of socks. Davis, who was fumbling around at the bottom of the footwear, suddenly noticed light was escaping from his fuzzy prison. He looked up to see five sweaty gargantuan toes wriggling their way in through the opening of the sock. In uttermost horror, he cried out, "TK, I SWEAR, IF I EVER GET BACK TO NORMAL, I'M GONNA-MMMPH!" He was cut off by having his entire body shoved in between the crevice between TK's big and second toe. Light was then completely shut off and TK wiggled his greasy toes that held Davis's frame between them like a plaything, sweat molding around his face and plastering his body that was held firmly to the skin, the massive digits perspiring within the stingy article of clothing. Microscopic droplets of sweat formed beads from the sweat glands that began to secrete them, due to the rising heat of the horrible environment. TK, from the outside, made sure his toes felt nice and comfy as he wiggled them and smiled, then placed his feet into his usual pair of shoes, giving them a nice kick to make sure they were nice and tight. Satisfied, he began walking. Now things were really getting hot and dark in the sock, as sweat was literally glazing over Davis's entire form and soaking into his clothes and bleaching his hair; Davis would gasp for breath, only to have his mouth filled with the salty fluid.

He felt sick to his stomach and was about to throw up all over TK's toes, as the motion of TK walking and stomping his feet was also helping with that, but then, due to all the slippery sweat that was buttering up his inch-tall frame, he slid downward even moreso until his whole body was completely buried and actually hugging the flesh in between TK's big and second toe, where a large pocket of toe jam coated along the sides and center of it, consisting of sweat, lint, dead skin cells, and just plain caught up gunk made up of who knows what.. Davis was really freaking out now, as he was literally becoming concealed in this nasty grime of junk and filth, the cheesy-like substance pasting up his sweat-soaked clothes nicely and entrenching his arms within as he would try and pull away. He reached out to the sides of him in a vain attempt to reel himself out by using the sides of TK's toes for support, but the glossy sweat that had built up and run along the skin made it slick and his hands slid off of them. The whool inside and around the foot was becoming heavier and thicker with perspiration, as it had been soaking it up, and the heat was only continually rising within. Davis was getting so hot now, he had started to take off his shirt, just to relieve himself if only even a little bit of the terrible heat. His body was shining in the darkness from both TK's sweat and his own, with the creamy-like toe filling encasing the lower-half of his body and abdomen densely. He was panting hard, his nauseousness beginning to fade, oddly, even after having just ingested entire globs of sweat and crud. He just coughed and hacked a bit, though, feeling his chest heave in and out, as he had stopped fighting and just lay motionless in the dark now, completely tired out. The room itself had stopped moving, 'cept for the occasional toe wiggle and flex here and there, as Davis had now guessed that TK was in a classroom, sitting down at a desk. After that, though, he would be heading home, which would mean he would be walking it, as TK never took the bus... Davis groaned just thinking about it. He held out his shirt in front of him and wrung it out of the salty sweat, watching it poor down from the fabric like a faucet. He couldn't believe a boy like TK, whom he had always thought to be of uttermost hygiene when compared to everyone else in the school, would ever be capable of all of "this" that he just gone through. He didn't think TK would care enough to pamper his feet or anything, but even so, this was just ridiculous... And after waiting a little while longer in the same position he was in, he then felt his whole beginning to shift once again as the faint sound of the school bell going off could be heard. "Great... Just great," Davis thought. So here was TK heading now?
15532111.title: "Socks" to Be Davis

155321111.content:
After say goodbye to his friends T.K. gathered up his things and made his way out of the school building. As he left the school gates he passed several kids boarding the busses. Just as Davis feared, the hat-wearing boy ignored them and continued on foot. In his right hand was his gym bag; filled with dirty and sweaty clothes that would need washing. Strapped to his shoulders was his backpack; filled with books and other accessories. With all the extra weight most people would jump for the bus; but not Takeru. T.K. enjoyed the exercise, plus there would be plenty of time for rest in his own home. As the blond opened up his cell phone and scrolled through his new emails and texts concerning Davis he was completely unaware that the very boy everyone was worried about was currently suffering inside his sock.

“Ughh…damn you, T.K.” Davis mumbled to the towering giant above him as he felt the nauseousness return as soon as the giant DigiDestined made it to the sidewalk. Each step Takeru took made Davis’s entire world lift up and down…up and down…up and down. As the tiny, shrunken kid pressed himself against the filthy flesh he squeezed his eyes shut and used all his mental control to prevent him from getting sick. Sure, perhaps vomiting over the giant’s toes would get him to notice him, but it was more likely he would just cover himself in more filth than what already drenched his body! This situation was hellish already; no need to make it worse.

Fifteen minutes of walking later, Davis had pretty much gotten used to the stomach tossing motion of T.K.’s footfalls. He hadn’t, however, gotten used to the foul odor that surrounded him. Nor had he gotten used to the sweat and toe gunk that covered his body; several times he had almost gotten sick again because that disgusting stuff had made it into his mouth. Worse of all, however, was the heat. It was so ungodly hot inside his sock prison that his body shined with almost as much of his own sweat as Takeru’s. Davis’s bare, smooth chest rose up and down as he gasped for air. His vision was getting blurry (not that he could see much anyway) and his body was so tired.

“Damn…I can’t keep my eyes open.” Davis said to himself; barely able to hear his own voice over the THOOMing being caused outside each time T.K. stomped down. His eyelids felt heavy and they slowly slid over his foggy eyes. Before losing consciousness Davis imagined himself dying in here…dying under the foot of his rival who would never know.

~~~

A little while later Davis was awoken by the sound of a door being shut down where in the distance. For the first second upon opening his eyes Davis thought he had dreamed the whole thing; a weird nightmare brought on by a concussion. Then he looked at his sweat drenched chest and the peach colored toes that belonged to his unknowing captor and he snapped back to reality. He sighed, wishing he had stayed asleep, but then noticed something different. While it was still dark as night inside the sock; Davis could make out a little more of his surroundings. The increase in light could only mean that T.K. was taking his shoes off, which means he was finally home. If some god out there loved him at all he would soon take off his socks as well. While waiting for that moment Davis noticed his hands were empty; his shirt was missing. It must of slipped out of his hand while he slept and was now somewhere underneath T.K.’s huge foot.

“I liked that shirt…” Davis complained to himself as T.K. left his shoes at the front door and made his way into his house.

“Mom, I’m home!” T.K. called, but got no reply. It dawned on him that his mother sent him an email during lunch explaining how she wouldn’t be home when he got back. T.K. had only skimmed through the email and couldn’t remember where she had gone and for how long. No matter; it meant he had the entire place to himself! The first thing the blond did was head to his room and drop his gym bag and backpack. With those burdens gone T.K. sat on his bed and proceeded to strip his feet of their socks. Once both of his baked feet were free the young man leaned back and wiggled and flexed his toes. A sigh of comfort escaped his lips as he felt the cool air brush against his bare feet and between his toes. As he spread and clenched those sore toes he said to himself, “Maybe I should think about taking the bus every now and then. My feet would probably thank me, haha.”

As T.K. relaxed, Davis…

1553211112.content:
Davis gasped loudly, finally being able to breathe in some fresh air after having been trapped within his blonde rival's steamy, rotten socks for whoever knows how long, though yet, much to his discontent and horror, he was still glued in between the youngest Takaishi boy's toes from all the sticky, slowly drying sweat built up in there! He was really starting to get frustrated, as he then began batting the sides of T.K.'s two biggest toes (the ones he was trapped within) with his arms, but in a once again vain attempt to get noticed, as T.K., just like before, did not feel anything the inch-tall boy did, much thanks to his very now diminished stature and thanks to all the sweat and gunk that had accumulated deep within those toes, acting almost as a barrier, which protected the skin from such tiny feels as the ones Davis had made. Takeru sighed, still wiggling his toes and feeling the cool air run in between them. He could see how shiny his feet were with sweat and little flecks of graying lint decorating the tops and bottoms of his soles, with huge mounds of them wedged up between his thin toes. Just how they looked every time he had gotten home after Basketball days, he thought. As he wiggled and flexed his toes there, Davis was getting the whole show of it, up close and personal. He felt as if he was in a washing machine, with the gargantuan mammoth toes ramming into his sides and rubbing all over and along his body, coating him in more perspiration and dead skin cells. Heaps of toe jam and sock fuzz stuffing into his face and sliding all around his naked chest, greasing the small boy up from head to toe, as he looked up in anger (and a curious bit of envy) and cursed once more at the the giant blonde-haired, blue-eyed teen from above.

After about another minuet of this treatment, T.K. finally swung over his legs up on the bed and layed his head back on the pillow, taking off his white hat and lazily tossing it over the side of his bed. With his whole body laying flat now, his feet were sat propped up on their bare heels, and Davis, who had been coughing up slimy crud and wiping off more of T.K.'s perspiration and his own off of his face, looked up and signed a bit to himself in relief. Takeru had finally settled down now and was just laying there in bed, his eyes closed as he breathed softly in and out. Davis, all sweaty and trembling, looked down from his perch from between the Takaishi boy's toes, ironically hugging on to the second toe for dear life. It looked like a long way down to him, but if he could slide himself down the slightly slanted top of the foot easily, he should be okay, he thought to himself. As he was about to place one reluctant foot on some flesh below, he suddenly heard an obnoxiously high-pitched voice calling out. "T.K.!! T.K.!!!" Oh no, Davis realized... It was Patamon, the blonde-haired boy's digimon partner. Patamon came flying into the room and landed on T.K.'s chest. "Hi, T.K.!" Patamon chirped happily. Takeru opened his eyes and smiled softly at his little friend, "Hey, Patamon..." "So, how was your day at school?" the orange creature asked, his big blue eyes shining into his partner's with enthusiasm. "Well, Davis got hurt pretty badly today in our basketball match, actually... He got a minor concussion after running into the basketball pole on accident." "Wow, really? How'd he manage that?" "Well, he actually tripped over his own shoelaces and did it," T.K. said, chuckling a bit at the thought. "Well, I hope Veemon isn't too worried about him, then..." "He'll be just fine. He should be back within one day tops, maybe. It was just minor, really." T.K. said, stroking the soft fur on his digimon's back. Davis, listening to the whole conversation, only wished it could've been true... Little did Takeru and everyone else know, including his own family, that he was only one inch tall now and captive to this blonde-haired teen's toes, and probably never to return to normal size again! He just wanted to cry thinking about it, but in his mind, even at this point, he still had trouble even registering all of this to be real/reality...

"So other than what happened to Davis, did you have a nice day?" Patamon asked, enjoying the warm strokes on his back that his partner was giving to him. "Yeah, I'm just really tired out right now and my feet are killing me..." T.K. said, sighing. "Hmm..." Patamon looked over at the Takaishi boy's feet at the foot of the bed and waddled up to them. He then smelt the foul air around them and his little face grimaced. "Pee yew, T.K., you should really wash your stinky feetsies now!" the orange-furred creature giggled. T.K. grinned mischievously at this, "Hey, how about instead of you acting like my mother and telling me what to do, you massage them for me?" the boy chuckled, lifting his foot up a bit (the one with Davis still in between the toes) and bringing it over to the bat-winged animal. "Hey, get your smelly piggies away from me!" the digimon laughed jokingly, plowing his little hands into T.K.'s sweaty sole, trying to push it away. "Ah, that feels good, keep doing that," the blonde remarked playfully, laughing to himself as well and trying to push his bare foot even closer to the little digimon's face, in a fun manner. Patamon laughed, falling down flat against the bed as the sole had pushed him off his feet; he then used his little legs to try and kick it away. "You can't make me!" he squealed delightfully, giggling like a little kid. As the two played this little game innocently with each other, Davis, who had now once again felt like he was being thrown back and forth and all about, felt sick and nauseated. "Ugh... What did I do to deserve this?" he groaned, stifling himself from throwing up. What happens next?
