15532111122.content:
Davis groaned in sheer disgust as T.K.’s foot moved around atop Patamon. His face started to take on a green hue as he did his best to hold back getting sick. Just when he thought he couldn’t take anymore the movements finally stopped. The shrunken Japanese teen panted between his rival’s toes as the giant feet came to a rest on the bedroom floor. Through blurry vision he could make out T.K. touching his stomach high above him.

“I could go for a snack,” T.K. said to Patamon. “I didn’t have a lot of lunch, after all.”

“What?” Patamon flipped himself off his back and looked at the larger human. “But, T.K., it’s not snack time yet! You know your mom doesn’t like it when you sneak snacks; you’ll get fat!” The small, winged Digimon puffed up his cheeks in an angry way.

“Aww, come on, Patamon.” T.K. replied with a chuckle as he stood up and looked down at his partner with his hands on his hips. “Mom isn’t here right now, and if you don’t tell her I’ll give you some~!”

“…really?” Patamon’s eyes lit up with joy. “Alright, fine! Just this once!”

“Atta boy.” Takeru smiled and walked out of his room. Down below, Davis grimaced that his rest was over and once again endured the constant up and down movements as the giant blond walked through his home. With nothing else to do the grimy, sweaty teen just stared up at the titan that loomed above him. His eyes were filled with anger and envy as he glared upon the titanic blond. Why did this have to happen to him? Not once did he ever feel inferior to T.K., but now he could hardly call himself an equal. HE should be the one walking around his house while a small and helpless T.K. suffered between his toes. HE deserved to be the bigger one; this was just too unfair.

“Ah man…this is just too much.” Davis complained as he closed his eyes so he didn’t have to look at his huge captor. “I could really go for a snack myself right about now…and maybe a cool drink.” The red head wiped some sweat from his forehead; unsure if it belonged to him or T.K. anymore.

Once in the kitchen T.K. grabbed himself a bag of popcorn and tossed it into the microwave. While the bag was popping the DigiDestined grabbed a bottle of water from the refrigerator. He took a few gulps from it before sighing contently and placing the bottle on the kitchen counter. The young boy then stood in front of the microwave and watched the popcorn bag inflate.

“I hear popcorn!” came Patamon’s voice before he leaped onto the counter.

“Hey, be careful!” T.K. exclaimed, but it was too late. The Digimon’s chubby body bumped into the water bottle and tipped it. T.K. managed to stop it from completely spilling over, but a small amount splashed onto his bare foot.

“Oops, sorry.” Patamon apologized with a frown.

“It’s okay, I don’t think any got on the floor.” the Digimon’s partner replied as he gave Patamon a pat. Unknown to either of them, that small bit of water had fallen right onto Davis and utterly soaked his half naked body. At first the shrunken teenager shuddered at the chilly liquid, but quickly became relaxed as it cooled his baked form.

“Well, I suppose that’s one wish granted.” Davis said to himself as he licked some water off his lips. What the little, wet teen didn’t know was now only did the spilt water soak his body, but it also wet the area between T.K.’s toes. The crusty toe gunk that held him firmly in place begun to soften. Before he could realize this, however, the microwave buzzer went off above him and T.K. was once again on the move with a bag of fresh popcorn in one hand and a bottle of water in the other.

“Hey, T.K., if we have popcorn does that mean…?” Patamon started to ask as he flew next to his slim partner.

“Yup! What do you say about watching a movie?” Takeru asked as he watched Patamon smile gleefully and land on his head of blond hair.

“That sounds fun! What are we gonna watch? A funny movie?” Patamon looked down at his partner’s youthful face with his big blue eyes. T.K. smirked and returned the gaze.

“Actually, I borrowed a horror film from Matt a few days ago. How about we watch that?”

“A-A what?” Patamon covered his eyes with his bat-like wings. “T.K., you know I don’t like scary movies…”

“Don’t be such a baby, Patamon. I heard Gabumon couldn’t make it through the entire film. Don’t you want to prove you’re braver than him?”

“He couldn’t? Hmmm…” The little Digimon’s wings returned to their normal positions and a smirk appeared on his cute face. “Alright, I’ll do it! I can’t wait to see the look on Gabumon’s face, hehe.”

With that settled the duo got set up in the living room. Both seated themselves on the couch in front of the television. Takeru clicked on the TV and DVD player before opening up the popcorn and relaxing back with his Digimon friend. Meanwhile, Davis also relaxed in a less comfortable position, thankful that T.K. had stopped moving. Since he was watching a movie he would hopefully sit still for the next hour or two and give Davis some time to think up an escape plan. The giant occasionally rubbing his toes together and squeezing his little form between those musky toes wasn’t helping, however…
15532111122.title: Snack and Movie Time

choices: "Ah, what's the worst that could happen?"
"I should just try and climb down from the couch and make my escape now..."
155321111222.content:
T.K.'s foot suddenly jolted up and sent Davis free-flying through the air... Davis was still shocked from the unexpected throw like that when he had landed deep into a sea of green (and what appeared to be made of a cotton or fabric of some sort) softness. As Davis then lay there motionlessly on his back and staring up at the ceiling, wide-eyed with horror and his heart audibly thumping loudly through his chest, he finally got up (albeit shakily) and saw that Takeru had just lifted up his feet to put them on a pillow. Just that single act alone had launched him up in the air like that, he thought... That really diminished what little was left of his ego there. Luckily, though, he had landed on something soft, so he just sighed to himself in relief of that and then began scanning the area around him... He had obviously landed on T.K.'s belly, he realized, what with the greenness of the usual shirt the boy would wear all the time, and with the odd "organic" noises he could make out with his keen little ears coming from deep below the material he was perched upon there. He heard T.K.'s body gurgling and growling, as if almost letting the tiny human know that the giant boy he was on top of was indeed alive, perhaps.

As Takeru from far back was chewing and swallowing his popcorn by the handful, wet and strenuous gulps could also be made out from afar by Davis, listening and then turning to watch the food pass down the blond boy's throat in a probably large, mashed up quantity, given by the size of the descending lump that was traveling downward through the boy's chest, making its way right to where inch-tall form was sitting over. Davis could feel the ground below him rising higher and higher with the more the teen he was on top of consumed and could even feel the muscles below him work to contract over and help process the meal being digested and made into nutrients underneath the fleshy outward exterior. He almost shuddered a bit at the thought, realizing just how easily he could now fit inside his rival's gut at the size he was and help to become part of his body as well, but shook it off to remember that he, too, was hungry, just as his own stomach so noisily let him know. He was glad to have gotten a nice sip of that water from before (thanks to Patamon's shenanigans), but now after that, he wanted something to eat a little of at least to go along with it. He looked on past T.K.'s chest, watching the mammoth hand of the massive digidestined raise what would be a ton of popcorn to him above his mouth and dumping it in carelessly and slobbily, just as any teenage boy who wouldn't have particularly cared about his neatness there would. And thanks to that bit of recklessness, Davis felt his heart drop when a kernel unnoticeably dropped from between the blond's fingers and tumbled on downward to his chest. Davis gulped, feeling himself beginning to salivate as he looked onward, realizing that this was his perfect chance. Even at this size, he knew he had to get something eventually to eat to sustain himself... So as he thought it out there a bit for a minuet or so, he finally decided and said aloud to himself...
155321111222.title: "Pop" Goes the Davis

choices: Davis is swallowed down to T.K.'s stomach.
1553211112221.content:
“Ah, what’s the worst that could happen?” Davis said out loud while smiling to himself. He hoped, in the back of his mind, that those weren’t his famous last words. The growling sounds coming from his bare stomach told him he wouldn’t last much longer without some kind of food. So what if he managed to climb down to the floor? He would probably collapse from hunger before ending up underneath T.K.’s foot the next time he got up! “Don’t worry, stomach, you’ll have your food soon!” Davis told his belly as he placed a hand against it. He focused his eyes on that single, delicious looking popcorn kernel before beginning his dash toward it. Meanwhile, the giant blond would continue his movie watching, unaware of the tiny trekking across his body.

As Davis ran full speed toward his food, he occasionally looked up at the young DigiDestined’s face to see what he was doing. His eyes were always locked onto the television; a handful of popcorn occasionally being shoved into his mouth where it was chewed up loudly. Sometimes the handful would go to Patamon instead; who would happily munch on the snack food. Sadly, no more loose kernels fell from the teen’s hand.

It took longer for the inch sized DigiDestined to get to the kernel than he would of liked. As the young teen stood on his rival’s chest, he could feel it raise and lower with each breath. It was like standing on a living hill. Since he was so close to T.K.’s face now, the sounds of the giant chewing, slurping, and swallowing were almost deafening to him. If Davis didn’t know he was atop his friend, he would of thought these sounds came from some sort of devouring Digimon. Davis was entranced by it all before his hungry eyes fell upon the popcorn kernel a few feet away. Davis licked his lips and drool dripped down his chin as he approached the steamy, warm piece of food.

“Oooh yeah. Come to Davis~” the shrunken teen mumbled as he picked up the crunchy snack of buttery goodness. At a size bigger than his head, this single kernel of popcorn was like an entire meal to him! “This is gonna be so good!” Davis licked his lips one last time before plunging his face into the white kernel. The tiny boy nibbled on it a bit before swallowing and making a loud sound of content. His face was covered in melted butter and white dust, but he barely stopped to breath before going back for another bite.

Unbeknownst to him, T.K. had happened to glance at his chest and spot the fallen popcorn kernel. The glance only lasted a millisecond before his eyes returned to the TV screen. Then, without bothering to look down, T.K. pinched the popcorn kernel between his fingers. By the time Davis noticed him and the kernel get pinched between those two finger pads it was too late. His first thought was that T.K. had finally noticed him; that this nightmare would soon be over. Those hopes came crashing down when T.K. brought Davis to his mouth and parted his lips. The red haired boy’s face was struck with absolute horror as he gazed into the dark cavern of his friend’s mouth; strings of saliva connecting his teeth together. Davis had just enough time to begin a shriek before T.K. thoughtlessly tossed him inside.

“No, no, no, no, NO!” Davis chanted as he landed on T.K.’s huge, wet tongue. He still clung to the popcorn kernel as it was flicked to the right side of T.K.’s mouth; right under a white molar. Davis’s body seemed to move itself as he instantly let go of the kernel and rolled off the teeth just as T.K. clamped down and decimated the popcorn kernel. If Davis had been a moment slower it would have been him being ground up into paste by those pearly whites.

“Gotta get out gotta get out!” Davis repeated in a panic as he landed back on the slick tongue and looked around. “There’s gotta be a way out of here!” The athletic teen got to his feet (which sank into the soft tongue of his rival) and tried his best to wobble toward where he was tossed in. The lips were already closed, but Davis wasn’t known for giving up.

Alas, even if T.K.’s mouth had been wide open, Davis had no chance of escape. It barely took any effort at all on T.K.’s part to chew up that single kernel of popcorn, so once it was reduced to a fine paste it was tossed back onto the tongue and then flicked to the back of the throat; Davis included.

“Damn it, NO! Stop, T.K.! Don’t swallow me!!” Davis screamed as loud as he could, but his screams were utterly drowned out by a single, powerful sound.

*GULP*
1553211112221.title: "Ah, what's the worst that could happen..."

15532111122211.content:
The little red-haired boy was readily tossed back by the motioning of the tongue, along with mashed up popcorn bits, back toward the very end of the cavernous room he was in. Davis' vision was blurred in pink, as he was sent in headfirst into the opening of the pharynx, which greedily opened up to allow his inch-tall body, along with the popcorn, in. The uvula, dangling above almost tauntingly, rose and let the back of the throat expand to slimily swallow him and the grounded yellow mush up. The last bit of light Davis saw before being swallowed was it coming out slightly from between TK's lips and teeth, which were just beginning to part again to accept another handful of popcorn in, having just about swallowed the batch (and him) in. Davis being saliva-ridden and all made him slick and was easily thrusted and slid downward, with the popcorn paste keeping him company by surrounding him on the start of this journey, and he could feel the pharynx closing behind his feet; hundreds of fleshy, wet muscles then grasping at him rigorously and shoving him down forth, to where it was almost painful for him getting swallowed.

Anyway, it all happened so fast that Davis' mind actually went blank. In one moment he was in the jaws of his friend and fellow digidestined, standing on top of the tongue and trying to run up along it, looking to escape. Then within a matter of milliseconds later, he had been pushed back instantaneously and gulped down like that. He didn't even have time to register it or think at all. He just sort of understood it all from a physical viewpoint, being tossed around and about and back and forth all so suddenly, and now spiraling downward to the belly of the beast below. He felt his body, arms, legs, and everything being constricted downward in a snake-like motion. His body passing down through TK's throat, with it visibly from the outside creating a larger-than-before lump that was going down slightly slower than normal, due to him still being decently-sized for an actual single swallow. TK even felt it a bit after having just swallowed the petty digidestined, unbeknownst to him, and placed his fingers up to his throat, drumming it along to feel the large bulge being effortlessly, yet slightly painfully, dragged down. He swallowed again, so as to help to push down the uncomfortable mass quicker and gasped for air after, relieved to feel his throat empty out. He then looked down and patted the walls of his chest with the back of his fist, so as to make sure there wouldn't any further obstructions. "Must've swallowed a seed or something..." the blond-haired boy thought to himself, then continued his focus on the movie, not giving it another thought.

Poor Davis was struggling and trying to grasp at the sides of the esophagus with his arms, so as to maybe slow the process down some, but the rhythmic flow was just to strong, and the sliminess of the constricting tube also hindered him from doing so. Saliva-drenched popcorn muck was being forced into his face on the way down, rubbing up along his sides and mixing beside his bare body and clothes, staining it with buttery, saliva-y tang. He tried to even open his eyes, but the popcorn around him would prevent him from doing so, being shuffled along with him. Even with his eyes closed, though, he could tell that it was getting darker and darker as he passed on downward, as well as the climate itself changing, getting hotter and hotter as he went in. He passed by the larynx, which closed so as not to allow him or the popcorn make its way into the lungs, and then passed by the heart, which he could hear the beating of through the alive walls. Though after having passed the heart and hearing its beats fade away into the outside world, the sound of gurgles, gargles, and growling was erupting closer and closer from the depths below.

As his head reached the very end of the esophagus in his short-lived journey, he felt a ring of harder flesh, which was the cardiac orifice, open up to accept and squeeze his body through, again in a snake-like motion, along with the popcorn bits, with the muscles in the back pushing his legs and feet in after him and shoving him down forth. He was just lazily and greedily dumped onto the flabby, fleshy stomach floor, being treated as no more than another piece of meat for Takeru's body to process. He instantly got up from the slimy, shallow-with-bile and popcorn mush-covered ground, disgusted and absolutely horrified. He wiped the popcorn stuff off his eyes and opened them up... completely pitch black, though he could vaguely make out the shining of slimy mucus on some of the walls around him, in which he could also make out tiny ridges along the stomach lining, which were to help to break down food particles mechanically, once the digestion process got going. Luckily for the tiny boy inside this belly, though, the stomach had just now been receiving content and being filled with food (which Davis was just so rudely reminded of, as the cardiac orifice above his head opened up again to empty out more popcorn grime on top of him), so it wasn't in the process just yet. Though Davis knew he had to react fast and quick.

Feeling himself start to tear up, as the full realization of having just been entirely swallowed alive, by his own dear friend (and yet, rival) for that matter, was further sinking in. He could feel the vicinity around him, smell the decaying scent of popcorn and faded aromas of past foods ingested at earlier times, and hear the horrible, wet, slushy, organic noises echoing around him, within the room and outside of the room, even hearing blood flow around the stomach. It all really sent him into an instinctive, primal-driven madness to escape, just as any animal would have in that given situation. With all his instincts telling him to survive, he ran up to the stomach walls, shoes splashing in the bile and unidentified mixture of juices below, and began banging on them with all his might, crying out, "TAKERU, NO! You gotta let me out! Please!!" he screamed at the top of his voice, even using TK's full name, "Let me out!!!" Takeru from the outside, however, simply felt almost a "bubbling" coming from within his belly, in which he just merely shrugged it off with much thought. He even placed his hand on his stomach afterward, feeling it and rubbing it, in unison of all the delicious popcorn he had just consumed. Davis felt TK's hand place against the wall from the outside and was even pushed back a bit from the knock-back. He was beginning to sweat profusely from the humidity within the youngest Takaishi boy's tummy and even began panting from it, too, but also from having used up a lot of what little energy he had left in his small, now unstable body (also from not having eaten much of anything to eat at all as well).

As he stood there, shivering in complete exasperation and eyes widened with grief in finding it hard to fully comprehend the current role he served, which was to end his life as Takeru's snack, inescapable memories suddenly starting flooding to him. He remembered the first time he had ever even met Takeru, in which the blond's first words to him were: "You look familiar" (having thought of him as a Tai look-a-like back then), and he remembered how the rivalry between them even all started. It was mainly because of Kari, the girl he liked. He then starting feeling small waves of the fluid sunk below his feet start to splash up against the sides of his legs and him. He looked around the room, noticing a subtle change within the darkness of the mucus-coated organ. Piles of grinded popcorn were being motioned back and forth, and Davis could feel himself being brought into the movement as well. Digestive peristaltic contractions were beginning, which were essentially to help break down the food that was about. Davis tried to maintain his stance, but was then thrown into the waters with a splash. He tried to get up, gasping and pleaing for help, but all to no avail.

Gastric glands lining the walls began secreting the hydrochloric acid and enzymes, along with mucus to lubricate and protect the stomach walls themselves, that would help to break down the food in the room into the liquid below, in which Davis began feeling a slight tingling on his body, especially along his chest and back (as he was not wearing a shirt anymore). He couldn't even find himself being able to get up anymore, due to lack of energy and the actual toxic atmosphere around him, physically weakening him more and more by the moment. Piles of popcorn being flown around in the cramped room like a washing machine, along with the flow of stomach juices, mixing it all together in a big, soup-like mixture. Davis' eyes were beginning to slowly close in on him, as the tossing and turning of the digestive process within the belly itself was alone lethal to his frail, delicate frame. Realizing there was no escape, he lost all will to continue and only sighed softly now. If only Takeru had known, he thought. Still, at least he was giving up his life for a friend, even if it wasn't much he was giving... Perhaps a tiny bit of energy more than what Takeru would've gained without him in the popcorn, but he still accepted it as it was. Finally letting nature take its course and closing his eyes, he feel into a deep, deep sleep, as he and the food would be soon mixed into the bath of acid, bile, etc., and, over time, developed into chyme, which would later pass through TK's small intestine.

Takeru, from the outside, continued to watch his movie, a hand etched over his flat belly, which gurgled noisily to the food it was processing. TK felt a bubble rise up to his throat and he burped loudly. Patamon looked up and threw a kernel at him. "Hey, that's gross!" Patamon snickered. TK laughed, "Sorry, must've been something I ate..."
15532111122211.title: The End of Goggle Boy

15533.content: How the hell could I have forgotten about Reborn?!
15533.title: Katekyō Hitman Reborn!

155331.content: We start off with the main character and 10th boss of the Vongola Family.
155331.title: Tsunayoshi Sawada

1553312.content: He's 3/4 Italian, 1/4 Japanese, and 100% the Tenth's Right-Hand Man!
1553312.title: Hayato Gokudera

15533122.content: A fan of baseball and a skilled swordsman. Can this so called natural born hitman and #1 athlete survive being shrunken?
15533122.title: Takeshi Yamamoto

155331221.content:
It was a bright and sunny day in the town of Namimori. The sky was clear, the birds were chirping, and the humidity was just right. All in all it was an overall excellent day to be alive. On this perfect day, Takeshi Yamamoto walked down the sidewalk with a big smile on his face. The black haired teen was dressed in a white buttoned-up shirt over a plain red t-shirt, a pair of blue jeans held up by a black belt, and a pair of black sandals. Slung over his left shoulder was his backpack; a wooden baseball bat poking out of it. The middle schooler was having a pretty decent day; he had aced two tests at school and his baseball team had won a game by an impressive margin. As he headed for Tsuna’s house to hang out with his friends, he wondered how this day could get any better.

Little did he know, his great day was about to do a one eighty and go right down the gutter.

“Hmm? What’s that?” Yamamoto suddenly mumbled after taking a sip of milk from a plastic bottle in his right hand. To his left, across the street, was a group of three high school students talking in an alleyway. Two of them seemed to be grouped around the third, but Yamamoto didn’t have a good line of sight to see why.

“Dude, careful where you point that! It’s a gun, you know!” one of them “whispered”, though Yamamoto could hear him perfectly.

“Is it even loaded? Why was it just lying on the ground here?” another one asked.

“How should I know? I doubt it’s even real…I mean look it at!” responded the third person. Upon overhearing their conversation, Yamamoto considered facing the trio of older boys. Judging by their rambling, one of them was holding a gun and that’s NOT something one should be carrying on the streets. However, when two of the young men stepped away from the gun holder, the Rain Ring Guardian’s expression quickly changed into a goofy smile. The “gun” the three were looking at was a shiny red and decorated with yellow bulbs and wires. It didn’t take perfect vision to realize it was just a toy.

“Heh, a little old to be playing with toy guns…” Yamamoto said under his breath before chuckling and continuing his walk to Tsuna’s residence. After taking just two steps, however, the trigger on the gun was pushed and it fired. A glowing red bullet, but still a very real bullet, was shot out of the gun’s barrel and hit the fourteen year-old right in the side of the head. His bottle of milk fell to the ground and spilt just as Yamamoto smacked into the fence he was walking by and slumped to the ground; apparently dead.

“Oh shit! I think you just killed that guy, dude!” one of the older teens cried before he broke out into a run. His two friends followed in a similar panic; leaving both the red gun and Yamamoto behind. No one else was around and thus no one bore witness to what happened next. The wound in Yamamoto’s head glowed crimson and the glow spread around his entire being. Once his entire unconscious body was glowing, it started to reduce in size. Smaller and smaller the young teenager shrank until the glow faded and he was only a mere centimeter in height; barely an insect.

“W-What happened…?” Yamamoto mumbled to himself as he awoke moments later, sitting up and touching the place he had felt a bullet hit. When he looked at his palm, however, he saw no blood at all. “I swore I got shot…what…?” The baseball nut’s brown eyes widened in shock when he got a look around. No longer was he standing on a sidewalk, but a landscape of concrete! The chain fence next to him rose for miles into the sky and the blades of grass the poked out of the chipped concrete loomed over him like trees. As the shrunken Vongola was still getting his fill of the breathtaking sight, his ears picked up the sound of rushing water. Looking straight ahead, Takeshi spotted his now massive (and empty) bottle of milk a ways away. The cold, white liquid was still leaking out of it and created a small trail of milk to a crack in the sidewalk. To the speck-sized Yamamoto, however, the trail seemed like a river and the crack a ditch he would need to leap over to cross.

“Wow…I’m REALLY tiny.” The Japanese boy chuckled and scratched the back of his head. “This could be a problem…at least no one’s around.” Soon after saying those words, he had jinxed them. The concrete dust (looked more like pebbles to him) started to hop up and down as slight tremors were sent through the ground. Yamamoto’s brown orbs gazed into the distance and he spotted a figure approaching him. They were still far in the distance according to the athlete’s perspective, but they were quickly approaching and would be on top of him in under a minute. Most importantly, this figure was…
155331221.title: A Great Day to Shrink

1553312212.content:
Ryohei Sasagawa, the 10th Vongola Sun Guardian and upperclassman to Yamamoto and his friends, strolled down the sidewalk. The approaching teen appeared to be having a good day as well as he waltzed along in his tan V-neck shirt and black jeans. Buried in his ears was a pair of headphones jacked into an iPod hidden in his pocket. The middle school student appeared very carefree; his eyes partially closed as his lips mouthed the lyrics to the song he was listening to. Occasionally he would even voice his favorite lines.

“Knock ‘em down, Mess ‘em up! Send them packing with your trump!” Ryohei chanted as he stomped his white sneakers against the ground to the beat and swung his bandaged hands in front of him as if fighting someone.

“It’s Senpai! What a coincidence!” Yamamoto exclaimed, happy to see a familer face…even though that familer face was now a giant to him. Ryohei was walking in the opposite direction Yamamoto had been going; the two of them probably would have passed each other if the young baseball player hadn’t shrunk, but now Ryohei had no idea he was even there. “SENPAI! DOWN HERE!” Yamamoto shouted as loud as he could as he waved his arms over his head. The larger Guardian took no notice, however, and just kept on walking toward the shrunken Rain Guardian. The tiny boy continued to shout, but his cries slowly trailed off into silence. He had stopped not only because his efforts were proving futile, but every second he wasted brought Ryohei closer and closer to him. The centimeter-tall Yamamoto started craning his neck back as he realized how unbelievably huge his upperclassman really was.

The gray haired male was like a titan pulled straight out of a Greek myth. He towered larger than Yamamoto like some kind of higher being and the smaller male couldn’t help but feel a little intimidated by the approaching behemoth. His white sneakers sent tremors through the sidewalk and made the tiny, younger boy wobble. These were just his normal footsteps too! Every now and then the muscular boxer would stomp his feet in unison with the beat of his music and send even stronger quakes through the concrete; quakes that only someone as itty-bitty as Yamamoto could feel. The last mighty stomp sent Yamamoto off his balance and he fell onto his rump.

“Ah…wow, it’s like Senpai isn’t even a human being anymore!” Yamamoto noted as he rubbed his butt through his jeans. A moment later one of Ryohei’s massive shoes came down on Yamamoto’s empty milk bottle; crushing it flat without the fifteen year-old noticing. The black haired micro winced at the loud sound of crunching plastic and made note not to end up underneath one of those lethal stompers. However, as he thought this, he failed to realize this action meant the looming giant was just a couple steps away from him! When he DID realize the living mountain was dangerously close, he was just one step away.

“Uh-oh!” shouted Takeshi as he jumped to his feet and raced toward the left. He was much too late, however, and the giant of a boy took a step that placed his gargantuan foot directly over Yamamoto. The swordsman’s pupils dilated as he gazed up at the dirty trends of Ryohei’s shoe quickly coming down on him! “NO! Senpai, don’t step on-!” Yamamoto, his usually calm voice full of fear, wasn’t able to finish the sentence before Ryohei’s foot came down with a deafening THOOM. Yamamoto’s tiny form disappeared underneath the colossal foot, apparently crushed flat.

“Yeah~ Yeah~ Smash ‘em up good!” the energetic teen sang just as he unknowingly stepped on his fellow Vongola. The boxer snapped his fingers with his right hand and punched the air with his left. As that white shoe picked up again, one would think the bottom sported a new stain, but this was not the case. The shrunken teenager was still very much alive; his miniscule form having been caught between the trends of Ryohei’s shoe and plastered into a glob of pink gum.

“T-That was a little too close for comfort…” the shaken up teen admitted as he watched the ground rapidly zoom away as Ryohei raised his foot and then speed toward him as the foot touched down. Each time Yamamoto’s ears popped from the loud boom of the footstep and each time his handsome face came inches from being smeared into he concrete. The athlete tried to keep his cool and not move too much; he didn’t want to get dislodged from the gum at the wrong time and really end up smashed to death. For now all he could do was wait motionlessly for his chance to get free...
1553312212.title: Enter the Champ

15533122121.content:
While a little shaken up and dazed after his close encounter with death, Yamamoto was relatively unharmed. That wasn’t to say his pride didn’t sting a little bit, however. He was the tall, Number 1 athlete at school and a fairly popular kid, and yet here he was stuck between the shoe trends of another guy like a piece of lint. All around him was the smell of burnt rubber from Ryohei’s shoes stomping down on the warm concrete so much. The constant up and down motion of the foot was beginning to make the black haired teen nauseous as well.

“Ugh…Senpai…*THOOM*…if you could…*THOOM*…stop soon, that’d be great…*THOOM*…hehe.” Yamamoto mumbled, knowing full well Ryohei wouldn’t be hearing him.

The tiny swordsman’s wish was granted after another five minutes of walking when the gray haired boxer arrived at the front door to his house. Upon entering, Ryohei popped out his earphones and stuffed them into his pocket with his iPod. He then took a seat on the single, small step in front of the entrance and started prying off one of his shoes. The shrunken Yamamoto’s entire world shook as Ryohei gripped his shoe with his strong hands and pulled it off; flexing his socked toes once they were free. The Vongola then raised his shoe to his face and inspected the bottom of it.

“Ha! I knew I stepped on a few things...to the extreme!” Ryohei exclaimed as his huge black orbs homed in on Yamamoto and the pink gum. The much, much smaller teen was taken by surprise when the humongous, manly face of the older male took up his entire vision. Yamamoto’s body vibrated when Ryohei spoke so close to him and his mere breath pushed him further into the gum.

"Shit i can't blow my cover, and if the boss doesn't get to crush him then I'm dust!"

Izuku groaned as he opened his eyes, still feeling dizzy from his fall. However immediately something was wrong as the ground felt different, as if the material was more...close up.

Having his vision clear, Izuku gasped in shock as looming into the sky was the gate to U.A looking as big as a bridge.

"W-why is that so huge?! Or did i shrink?", Izuku mumbled in terror at the sudden shift in his size, was it a quirk, a dream?

Before he could panic more the ground began to shake, not like an earthquake but like that of...steps.

A shadow soon covered Izuku and the greenette looked in both fear and awe as looming over was...

info.brief_description: Anime guys are shrunken and their closest friends are none the wiser.
info.description:
Anime is littered with many different characters. Most of these characters are heroes destined for great things. They believe they’ll survive every obstacle, beat the bad guys, and save the day. However, what if they were faced with their “biggest” challenge yet: Shrinking? Would these Big Damn Heroes still come out on top when they’re the size of ants? Or do their true destinies take place on the bottom of someone’s foot? It’s all up to you…

~~Rules~~

1. This is strictly a male/male interactive. No girls can shrink and no girls can interact with the shrunken character(s). They can still be there, but keep them away from the shrinkies. If you don’t like it go find a GTS interactive. There’s plenty of them here.

2. This is a completely unaware interactive. This means the shrunken character(s) can never be found or noticed by the giants (unless they are mistaken for bugs, in which case go crazy).

3. The shrunken characters in this interactive are REALLY tiny. Do not make them any more than an inch tall. We want to make the chances of them getting help as close to zero as possible. >:3

4. All chapters (save for choice chapters) must be of decent length (at least a paragraph) and have good grammar. Any chapter that looks too short or looks like it was written by some who’s never heard of punctuation will be deleted. I’m not gonna spell check your additions.

5. This is an anime only interactive. As long as there’s an anime (or manga) of it, you can add it here. Do not add any characters from the real world or “Western Anime” like Ben 10 or Avatar.

6. VERY IMPORTANT: Choice Chapters Choice chapters are important. They’re how all the plotlines begin. However, do not flood the interactive with them. After choosing who the “lucky” shrinkie is gonna be, do not take five chapters to decide who the first giant they encounter is. Also, and this is even more important, do not add ONLY choice chapters. After adding one or more choice chapters you must then add a REAL chapter to the interactive; either to one of your own choice chapters or anywhere else in the interactive. If I see someone has added a choice chapter, but not a real chapter and several hours have passed I will delete the choice chapter.

And that’s it. As long as you follow the above rules you may add anything else to the interactive. Almost everything is allowed; even stuff like hard vore, bathroom stuff, and sexual stuff. You can make the shrinkies find a way to return to normal…or give them a very humiliating demise. >:3
